Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if there's really any steps I can take to fix this myself and just hoping for a patch in the future.

Loaded up KSP Enhanced Edition on PS4 today.  The first time it had an error and closed (error report sent).  The second, third, and now forth times I got to the Continue Saved Game and it freezes when I select Load.

Hopefully there is a response when a fix is found.  Otherwise I'm sad to say I have to write off KSP for console for the second time.    Goodbye space-frogs.

Sorry to hear that mate. Have u tried to start your save with the cloudbackup that the ps automaticly made, no idea if this will help but maybe worth to try. Maybe back up your system saves on an usb drive
No, I did not have auto-upload turned on.  :/  I haven't bothered with backups since the days of memory overflow with the original KSP version.

2 minutes ago, RabidSeason said:

I haven't bothered with backups since the days of memory overflow with the original KSP version.

Yeah i know what u mean. I had corrupted saves since EE onces but that restored it self, never saw any game did this before and i dont know how it did that.  Can u at least start a fresh game without freezing?

Ugh.  Yes, I just started a fresh game.  I was giving myself a little time to mourn, but I do enjoy the early tasks and this gave me a chance to tinker with a few options that I left as default before.

Upwards and onward!
